SELECT p.p_name,SUM(pd.pd_quantity)AS pronum FROM i_purchasenote pn JOIN i_purchasedetail pd ON pn.pn_id=pd.pd_pn_id JOIN i_product p ON pd.pd_p_id=p.p_id LEFT JOIN i_supplier_product sp ON p.p_id=sp.spp_p_id LEFT JOIN i_supplier_customer sc ON sp.spp_s_id=sc.s_id
GROUP BY pd.pd_p_id ORDER BY pronum DESC LIMIT 10
